tmdb.title: Unforgotten: Twenty-Five Years After Willowbrook
tmdb.overview: It was a nightmare that shocked not only New York, but all of America. The public outcry about the Willowbrook State School for people with developmental disabilities resulted from Geraldo Rivera's expose on WABC after he had entered Willowbrook with a film crew in 1972, using a stolen key.

actors: Stars: Danny Aiello, Geraldo Rivera | See full cast and crew Â»
